name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus for Spotify: Removes Spotify Recommendations

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes recommendations on Spotify to create a focused listening environment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes certain elements on all Spotify pages to create a focused listening environment that's conducive to deep work.
